# LetsJobify - LLMs.txt

## About
LetsJobify is an AI-powered job search platform that helps job seekers find personalized job listings matched to their skills and preferences. We provide instant Excel reports with job listings from various sources, enhanced with AI-generated descriptions and match scores.

## Contact Information
- **Name:** Ritwik Mishra
- **Email:** mishra.ritwik.03@gmail.com
- **Address:** 647F/209 Shiv Vihar, Sector I, Jankipuram, Lucknow
- **Instagram:** https://www.instagram.com/letsjobify/

## Services
- Personalized job matching based on skills, sector, and location preferences
- AI-enhanced job descriptions using Google Gemini AI
- Match scoring to help users identify the most relevant opportunities
- Instant Excel file generation with job listings
- Secure payment processing via Razorpay

## Technology Stack
- **Backend:** Flask (Python)
- **Database:** MySQL
- **AI:** Google Gemini AI (gemini-2.0-flash)
- **Payment:** Razorpay
- **Job Sources:** RemoteOK API, and other job aggregators

## Data Sources
- Job listings are sourced from RemoteOK and other job aggregators
- All job links are direct links to the original job postings
- We comply with RemoteOK's terms of service and attribution requirements

## Privacy
- We collect job preferences, payment transaction data, and usage information
- Payment processing is handled securely through Razorpay
- Generated Excel files are stored temporarily and accessible via secure download links
- See our Privacy Policy at /privacy-policy for detailed information

## Legal
- Job listings are powered by RemoteOK (https://remoteok.com)
- All job links are direct links to RemoteOK job postings
- We respect the terms of service of all third-party services we use

## Last Updated
December 3, 2025
